thread.title: Nick D

author: Nick D
title: Nick D
text: Very impressed with the website -easy to use , helpful info provided when technical details needed. Great price and specifics ref the tyred themselves. Quick call rec'd one payment made via Paypal. On day of fitting i received a call to state they were on their way and within one hour of that call the works were completed. Very helpful and friendly guys in Steve and Tom
